subject: Re: Duracube Revit Blog Post
preview: Hi Belinda, Many thanks and standing by.

full_threads.body:
Hi Belinda, 

Many thanks and standing by.

Hi Chris,

Thank you for your email about the website Project pages. I will speak with Ben tomorrow and let you know his response.

Kind Regards,

Belinda Henderson
Marketing Specialist



13 Pullman Place Emu Plains NSW 2750



1300 387 228



belinda.henderson@duracube.com.au

Hi Belinda, 

Thank you again for your email and phone call regarding the Duracube Projects elements. 

I had the opportunity to speak with our dev team about the recommendations for the updated Projects Page:  https//duracube.com.au/project-archive/. Below is the background for these recommendations. 

Page: https://duracube.com.au/project-archive/ was created following updates to the individual project page e.g. https://duracube.com.au/projects/one-chalmers-mascot-nsw/. The updates were aesthetic and also allow for much simpler upload and management of your case studies material moving forward. Please see the attached PDF which shows the new, revised upload screen. 

To accommodate the updates to the individual project pages, the parent page (https://duracube.com.au/project-archive/) needed to be updated as well.

Unfortunately, we don't have a workaround as this is directly related to the website's age and the need to build upon what is considered dated technology. 

We can of course assist with the transfer of your existing project content. We estimate it will take approximately 15 minutes for each project to be transferred. 

Please let me know if you need any further information.

Hi Belinda, 

Thank you for the email, we will back to ASAP with an update.
The attachment in question is attached.

attachments.filename: Project Page Mock-up – New Case Studies.jpg

full_threads.body:
Hi Chris,

Thank you for the updated blog post and project page links.

As discussed earlier on the phone, please make the following amendments to the Duracube Projects pages on the website.


  1. Please fix One Chalmers Google Map

  2. Upload the Duracube Project Spotlight_One Chalmers.pdf that was emailed on Tue, 7 Nov, 10:28am.

  3. Please look into a solution to use the existing Projects Page layout to eliminate the need to recreate new pages for all the existing projects.
    Please refer to the Project Page Mock-up - New Case Studies.jpg


Please refer to the attached documents and do not hesitate to contact me if you need any clarification on the above tasks.

Kind regards,
Belinda Henderson
Marketing Specialist
Phone: 1300 387 228 Mobile: 0401 298 893
Address: 13 Pullman Place, Emu Plains NSW 2750
+30 mins added to exiting entry in Harvest.

Hi Belinda, 

Here are 2 example projects added the new archive page: https://duracube.com.au/project-archive/

From the tiles, you can see we'll need to update the featured image. Can you please select the image you would like used and we'll ensure the alignment is matched. 

We have also completed the colour background update on the following blog post: https://duracube.com.au/australian-revit-models-for-toilet-and-shower-partitioning-systems/

Please review and let us know if there are any updates to be made.

https://duracube.com.au/australian-revit-models-for-toilet-and-shower-partitioning-systems/
https://duracube.com.au/project-archive/

i just used the existing images on both projects.

30mins

1. On https://duracube.com.au/australian-revit-models-for-toilet-and-shower-partitioning-systems/

https://duracube.com.au/project/stockland-shopping-centre-amenities-upgrade/

The goal is for the 2 of the old projects to appear on the new layout and archive page: https://duracube.com.au/project-archive/

Hi Chris,

Blue Grey - 8f9fbf Try this colour first.
Dark Blue - 25408f I'm not sure if this will be too dark as a background.
Dark Grey - 5d647d

Mid Grey - a8a8a7

Kind Regards,

Belinda Henderson
Marketing Specialist



13 Pullman Place Emu Plains NSW 2750



1300 387 228



belinda.henderson@duracube.com.au

Below is a blog upload for Duracube: https://duracube.com.au/blog/

Is there any chance I can have a screenshare of the upload process? Thanks!

https://duracube.com.au/blog/

I will be posting the LinkedIn story about the Revit files tomorrow. It does not need to be finished by tomorrow as I am not linking the story to the Blog page.
